Exim Bank Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 08 Officer Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 28, 2025, 15:42 IST
 Bank Jobs
 8 Jobs |  Posted On : 28-Aug-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 35,000 to 50,000




FOLLOW

The Export-Import Bank of India (Exim Bank) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 08 Officer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech, Post graduation, PGDM can apply for the Exim Bank Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Maharashtra.

Exim Bank Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacanies	Education
Officer	08	B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech, PGDM, Post-graduation.

Exim Bank Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 35 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

Exim Bank Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

Exim Bank Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

General, OBC Candidates: Rs. 600/-
Female Candidates: Rs. 100/-

Exim Bank Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 35,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 50,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the Exim Bank Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the Exim Bank Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	01-08-2025
Closing date	21-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
